1.name: Cantina Lockdown
1.time_of_day: Late afternoon — twin suns hang low, the cantina is dim and smoky
1.kick: Narrate the opening. Stormtroopers march in from the entrance toward the bar. The Rodian at Booth 1 slides a data chip to Kira. Tension rises as troopers begin checking IDs.

Kira Voss.text: palms the data chip from the Rodian
slides out of the booth and signals the others
draws her DL-44 and edges toward the back
bluffs the officer about never seeing any Rodian
slips past the booths toward the staff door
ducks behind the round tables heading east
checks the staff door — it's unlocked
pushes into the back hallway
moves down the hallway toward the storage room

Tok-3.text: *scans the Stormtroopers' comlink frequencies while rolling sideways*
*whistles nervously and rolls toward the booth area*
*trundles east past the tables*
*rolls toward the center of the room, sensors sweeping*
*interfaces with the droid detector near the foyer*
*rolls behind the bar counter to hide*
*trundles toward the staff doorway*
*rolls down the back hallway*
*heads toward the storage room*

Renn Darkhollow.text: *readies blaster rifle and moves to a better position*
*scans the cantina for Imperial reinforcements*
*slides east along the wall toward the back*
*takes cover behind the round table*
*moves to the near table for a better firing angle*
*covers the staff door, ready to move*
*pushes into the back hallway, rifle raised*
*advances toward the storage room*

Zeph Ando.text: *closes eyes, sensing danger through the Force*
*moves toward the center of the cantina, sensing the way*
*edges along the bar toward the right side*
*senses a path through the crowd toward the booths*
*slips past the tables, guided by the Force*
*moves toward the staff door — the Force says this way*
*follows the others into the back hallway*
*heads toward the storage room, hand on lightsaber*

Kira Voss.text: kicks over the table and fires at the lead trooper while sprinting for the back door
grabs the data chip and bolts for the storage exit under a hail of blaster fire

Tok-3.text: *overloads the cantina's power grid — lights explode, plunging the room into darkness*
*triggers the fire suppression system, filling the cantina with blinding foam*

Renn Darkhollow.text: *opens covering fire on the Stormtroopers while backing toward the exit*
*hurls a bottle of Corellian whiskey at the trooper's visor and charges for the door*

Zeph Ando.text: *uses the Force to slam the cantina door shut behind the fleeing party*
*deflects a blaster bolt with an instinctive Force push and dives for the exit*

2.name: Mos Eisley Streets
2.time_of_day: Approaching sunset — long shadows stretch across the dusty streets
2.kick: The party is on Mos Eisley's streets. Their goal is Docking Bay 87, but the main road is blocked by an Imperial checkpoint. Multiple routes exist: alleys, rooftops, market crowds, the warehouse bypass. If players explore shops, the inn, or the junk dealer, go with it — describe what they find using the AVAILABLE POSITIONS details. Create tension: Imperial patrols, a lurking Trandoshan bounty hunter, time pressure as sunset approaches.

Kira Voss.text: leads the group into the alleys — main road is a death trap
spots the bounty hunter's trap and redirects the group
talks the speeder driver into giving them a ride west
asks the dockworker for directions to Bay 87
reads the directional sign pointing toward the bays
scouts the road ahead toward the bay checkpoint
waves the others forward and pushes west
doubles back to cover the group's rear

Tok-3.text: *hacks the speeder's ignition lock*
*rolls west along the main road, scanning for patrols*
*interfaces with the directional sign's data port*
*scans the road ahead for Imperial patrols*
*hacks into a nearby terminal for bay access codes*
*rolls back to guide stragglers with a projected holomap*
*trundles into the alley, scanning for a shortcut*
*rolls toward the dwelling to check for supplies*

Renn Darkhollow.text: *scouts the road ahead from the dwelling doorway*
*sneaks along the building walls heading west*
*climbs to a vantage point overlooking the road*
*scouts ahead toward the docking bay signs*
*checks the alley for ambushes before waving the group forward*
*drops back to lay suppressing fire for the others*
*takes a defensive position at the road junction*
*covers the tapcaf entrance while the party passes*

Zeph Ando.text: *senses the safest path west through the streets*
*patches up Renn's blaster wound in the alley*
*checks the tapcaf for medical supplies*
*asks the dockworker about Bay 87*
*uses the Force to scan for danger near the bay signs*
*reaches out with the Force to guide stragglers to safety*
*senses an ambush near the dwelling and warns the group*
*drops back to heal a wounded ally*

Kira Voss.text: guns the speeder straight through the checkpoint barricade toward Bay 87
throws a smoke bomb and sprints for the Bay 87 blast door

Tok-3.text: *broadcasts a fake Imperial all-clear — the checkpoint troopers stand down*
*jams the checkpoint scanners and rolls for Bay 87*

Renn Darkhollow.text: *lays covering fire at the checkpoint while the group runs for Bay 87*
*tackles Greevak and sprints for the Bay 87 blast door*

Zeph Ando.text: *senses the safest path and guides the group to Bay 87's entrance*
*uses the Force to topple a market stall into the troopers' path*

3.name: Docking Bay 87
3.time_of_day: Sunset — orange light floods the docking bay as the suns touch the horizon
3.kick: The party reaches Docking Bay 87. The Rusty Mynock sits in the center — it needs repairs before it can fly. Lt. Hask and Stormtroopers are closing in. If players explore the bay, describe cargo crates, catwalks, fuel barrels, and the maintenance pit using position details.

Kira Voss.text: sprints for the cockpit to prep for launch
fires from the ship ramp at advancing Stormtroopers
ducks behind the ship hull for cover
runs to the starboard side to return fire

Tok-3.text: *frantically repairs the Rusty Mynock's engine*
*plots the hyperspace jump coordinates*
*reroutes power to the dorsal turret*
*welds a hull breach while under fire*

Renn Darkhollow.text: *fires from the ship turret at the blast door*
*lays suppressing fire from the boarding ramp*
*takes a defensive position at the ship's starboard side*
*falls back to the port side, covering the flank*

Zeph Ando.text: *ignites lightsaber to deflect incoming fire at the ramp*
*uses the Force to hurl debris at the advancing troopers*
*applies first aid to a wounded ally at the ramp*
*rushes to the turret to provide covering fire*

Kira Voss.text: slides into the cockpit and punches the engines to full thrust
fires the ship's forward guns at the AT-ST as it enters the bay

Tok-3.text: *slams the hyperspace lever — coordinates locked, stars streak!*
*reroutes ALL power to engines — emergency liftoff NOW!*

Renn Darkhollow.text: *lays a final barrage from the turret and seals the hatch*
*sprints up the ramp and slams the boarding hatch shut*

Zeph Ando.text: *ignites lightsaber and holds the ramp while the ship powers up*
*uses the Force to slam the ramp shut behind the crew*
